summary: John Robin Warren AC  is an Australian pathologist, Nobel winner and researcher.
full_text: John Robin Warren AC  is an Australian pathologist, Nobel Laureate and researcher who is credited with the 1979 re-discovery of the bacterium Helicobacter pylori, together with Barry Marshall. The duo proved to the medical community that the cause of bacterium Helicobacter pylori  is the cause of most peptic ulcers.
title: Robin Warren
